Description:
Preschool Female teacherWe are looking for qualified preschool Female teacher (English Native Speaker is preferred)to work from 7:30 am to 1:30Salaries are specified base on qualifications (We pay high salaries!)Responsibilities :Creating a safe and welcoming classroom environment.
Developing and implementing age-appropriate lesson plans.
Providing instruction and guidance to young learners.
Managing classroom behavior and fostering an engaging learning environment.
Conducting assessments to monitor children's progress.
Communicating regularly with parents or guardians.
Collaborating with colleagues to create an effective learning environment.
Ensuring the safety and well-being of children.
Keeping accurate records.
Engaging in professional development activities.Skills
Skills:
Ability to relate positively with young children.
Previous teaching or assistant teaching position with a public or private school system, a quality preschool, or child care center is preferred.
Certification or degree related to early childhood or preschool or elementary education is desirable, but not mandatory.
Excellent oral and written English Language

Preferred.Nationality: All Eastern European Countries; All Western European Countries; Armenia; Great Britain (UK); United Kingdom; United States
